summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing Peter Mandelson's new role as deputy prime minister. The email reflects Epstein's communication with Staley, indicating a connection to political figures.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing political matters.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email from Epstein, indicating a professional relationship.

persons.name: Peter Mandelson
persons.context: Peter Mandelson is mentioned in the context of his new role as deputy prime minister.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are connected through professional correspondence.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein sent an email to Jes Staley on June 5, 2009.
The email discusses Peter Mandelson's appointment as deputy prime minister.
The email reflects Epstein's engagement with political matters.
